summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Gold Jewellery ERP Phase 1: Authentication & User Management. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend UI and navigation working correctly with minor dropdown interaction issue in registration form.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options not clickable via automation (UI interaction issue)
ui_bugs.note: Dropdown opens correctly and shows all options, but click interaction fails in automation. Manual testing may work fine.

passed_tests: User Registration API - All roles (admin, manager, sales)
Get Current User API - Token-based authentication
Get Users List API - Permission-based access
Toggle User Status API - Admin functionality
Frontend Login Page - All elements present
Frontend Login Flow - Valid/Invalid credentials handling
Frontend Dashboard - Stats cards and navigation
Frontend User Management - User list and permissions
Frontend Navigation - Between pages and mobile menu
Frontend Registration Page - Form elements present

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (17/18 tests passed - 1 minor UI interaction issue)
